comments:
Sometimes while doing a lot of "step intos" the step into button (in Eclipse
3.1.0) will become disabled. If I click on the thread in the Debug view and
click on the top of the stack (the activation record of the method I'm currently
in) suddenly the step into button will become enabled, and then I can click on it.

Thus, either the button is being disabled when it shouldn't (note that step over
is always enabled), or is being enabled when it shouldn't. Definitely a bug.

Any related exception in the .log file? I wonder if this is related to bug 
105095?

Here is something from that day in my .log. I'm not sure if it's related or not.

The exception in the log looks like a dup of bug 94452. Not likely the cause 
of the described problem.

The step actions are re-written in 3.2, and a similar problem has been fixed. See bug 124160.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 124160 ***

traces.message: Timeout occurred while waiting for packet 1231 .
